en.stage1MissionText1: Welcome to the Robo League Raceway.
en.stage1MissionText2: Tomorrow is the biggest race event of the year.
en.stage1MissionText3: Sadly our test driver for the day has yet to show up to work.
en.stage1MissionText4: It's up to you to test drive our new vehicles.
en.stage1MissionText5: Can you please choose a vehicle to drive?
en.stage1MissionText6: For the first mission of the day, We need you to drive to the end of this course.
en.stage1MissionText7: Before you start you should know about motion.
en.stage1MissionText8: Motion is the change in the position of an object.
en.stage1MissionText9: By driving to the end of this course we use the motion of our vehicle to change our position.
en.stage1MissionText10: It's important to know that the energy of motion we use to drive our vehicle is a kind of mechanical energy.
en.stage1MissionText12: Before the vehicle can move we need to choose one of two upgrades. You can increase the motion of the car or increase the friction of the car.
en.stage1MissionText13: We are going to need to be going fast to clear the gap in the jump. Choose your upgrade now!
en.stage1MissionText14: Excellent. You can accelerate and brake with the up and down arrows or the W and S keys. Use the left and right arrows, or the A and D keys to steer.
en.stage1MissionText15: We will catch up more at the end of the course.
en.stage1MissionText16Correct: Well done! Adding an upgrade to increase motion allowed us to clear the gap. Remember motion is the change in the position of an object.
en.stage1MissionText17: Excellent work. That's the first course tested. Lets move onto track 2.
en.stage1MissionText18Incorrect1: Looks like you increased the friction of the car and it slowed us down so much we didnt make the jump.
en.stage1MissionText19Incorrect2: Please choose a new upgrade for your vehicle!
en.stage1MissionText20CorrectNMJ: Oh looks you made the correct upgrade but didnt quite make the jump. Try again!.
en.stage2MissionText2ChooseCar: Can you please choose a vehicle to drive?
en.stage2MissionText3: Before we get testing the course, we need to talk about energy.
en.stage2MissionText5: The energy of motion is called kinetic energy.
en.stage2MissionText6: It looks like someone has set up piles of boxes all over the course. Some of these boxes should be there but some of them shouldn't.
en.stage2MissionText7: Today's task is to destroy one type of box from the course by driving through them.
en.stage2MissionText8: The first set of boxes is colored blue and labeled Energy. The other set of boxes is colored red and labeled Resistance.
en.stage2MissionText9: You need to use the info on the side of the screen to decide which color of boxes need removing.
en.stage2MissionText10: Remember that all moving objects contain energy.
en.stage2MissionText11: It's important to know that each set of boxes will affect your vehicle.
en.stage2MissionText12: Energy boxes will increase your speed, Resistance boxes however will slow you down.
en.stage2MissionText13: There is a large pile of boxes at the very end.
en.stage2MissionText14: You'll need to build up enough energy through the motion of the vehicle to knock the final pile of boxes off the course.
en.stage2MissionText16: Oh those boxes seemed to have slowed you down.
en.stage2MissionText17: Well done, those were the correct boxes to remove and your vehicle has gained speed. Can you remove the rest of them?
en.stage2MissionText18: Here comes the final pile of boxes. Let’s hope you have enough speed.
en.stage2MissionText19: Well done, We used the energy of motion from our moving vehicles to clear all the incorrect boxes off the course
en.stage2MissionText21: Looks like you didn't remove enough boxes.
en.stage2MissionText22: Remember that the motion of our vehicle contains energy. Let’s use that information and try again.

es.stage1MissionText20CorrectNMJ: Oh looks you made the correct upgrade but didnt quite make the jump. Try again!.

es.stage2MissionText19: Well done, We used the energy of motion from our moving vehicles to clear all the incorrect boxes off the course
